short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can customize the style of any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Custom CSS Editor for Websites
With this extension, you can effortlessly customize the appearance of any website by writing your own CSS. Whether you're tweaking layouts, changing colors, or hiding elements, this tool provides a flexible solution for personalizing your web experience.

Key Features:
 -    Apply custom CSS styles to any website in real-time.
 -    Use the Ctrl + / shortcut to quickly comment out sections of your CSS code for easy editing.
 -    Easily manage and store your custom styles, so they're ready whenever you need them.

Make the web your own with personalized styles!
